name: Corporation Inc.
summary:
游戏的目标自然就是要建立世界级的强大企业。在《主题公司》中，玩家的任务除了建设公司、聘用工人并时刻关注公司的预算开支外，还需要考虑到如何激励员工士气、如何通过聘请研究员从而扩大公司的经营范围……

Corporation Inc. is a video game from Armor Games, programmed by John Cooney (jmtb02), with art by Jimp, in which players create a push-button company that makes a profit with workers (Workers, IT, Janitors, Managers, Human Resources, and Accountants). These are placed in offices that can be upgraded to suit the workers inside, such as an Advanced Accounting office which increases their benefits. This game has more than 10 million plays on Armor Games and has been on their Most Popular list.

http://armorgames.com/play/7348/corporation-inc
http://www.kongregate.com/games/armorgames/corporation-inc
汉化： http://wanga.me/12532

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Corporation_Inc.
